title: MY PLACEMENTS
body:
Heyy guys and gals of the rift, ive currently gotten back to my Acc and have decided its time to hit ranked games, ive completed 4 of my placement games out of 10 and i must say ive had a mixed level of performances. I'd love if anyone would like to add me and have some fun games Feel free to add me and jump in if you wanna try help me get to a respectful rank :)
THANKKKKKKKKKKS!!!!
